Header: Many including Monks oppose the mudslinging poster campaign against Hiru
Content: Senior Member of the Ramanya Maha Nikaya, Chief incumbent of the Getambe Raajo-Pavanaa-Raamaya Venerable Keppetiyagoda Siriwimala Thera says that he condemns those who attack media freedom while also campaigning on the pretext of protecting media freedom. This was issuing a special statement over media suppression carried out targeting HIRU. Meanwhile, Opposition Leader Mahinda Rajapaksa also condemned the actions against HIRU. Mudslinging posters had been put up around Colombo recently against HIRU and the Police are currently carrying out an investigation in that regard.
